function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to green space in deprived areas","Impact":"Disproportionate influence on public health and quality of life","Mitigation":"Implement planning policies to create green space for neighborhoods that lack them","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technologies","People":"People living in deprived areas","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Large numbers of people entering parks against guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to overcrowding","Mitigation":"Enforce park guidelines, increase park capacity, and educate the public on the importance of social distancing","Technologies":"Park management technologies and public health communication tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Local authorities and park management organizations"},{"Description":"Quality of urban green space","Impact":"Influence on public health and quality of life","Mitigation":"Improve the quality of existing green spaces through landscaping, maintenance, and amenities","Technologies":"Green space design and maintenance technologies","People":"Residents of urban areas","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, and landscape architects"}]}
